page.title: 12MY DAY AT SCHOOL-TIM PRESTON
page.content: OUR DAY - First I get up at 7.00a.m. then I get dressed and after that I have breakfast and I have honeysmacks. At halfpast eight I go down to the bus stop and wait at the bus stop for the coach and we get on it and go to school and when we get to school we have assembly and we sing our carols for our Christmas Play. Then we get our reading books out then we have our milk in cartons and go out to play and at playtime we like playing "IT". Then we come in and do some work. We do Maths,I like that best of all. After that we go to the toilet and wash our hands and then we eat our dinner.After that we go and play for a long time. Then the bus comes to pick the third years and the fourth years for swimm- ing. Then we come back to school. Then we go home on the bus. - by Tim Preston,age 7, of Wreningham School.
